About Me Work

Hello, I'm Alicia.

Junior Web Developer from Costa Rica lives in San Francisco with experience creating responsive websites.

A multidisciplinary and diverse background has given me an eye for detail and an appreciation for design. I love coding because I like languages, communication, and the journey of building the tools to enable me to bring my ideas to life.

Want to work together? I’d love to hear from you.

Work

Wandergo. A travel app built with Ionic 1 and AngularJS. Main objective was for user to be able to login via Facebook, search and book flights via Momondo’s API, reserve hotels via Booking.com and also explore the destination city for activities and restaurants via Foursquare. I led this project with a senior developer./p> Check it out

Flowerbx. A flower delivery service in London built with Magento 2. Main objective was to maintain and debug across all capabilities, searching, favorites, payment and delivery methods, also update the database and enhance the design.

Check it out

Horse Scout A Wordpress site for equestrian enthusiasts used for buying and selling premium horses. My main responsibility was to go through tickets and debug as issues came up, and ensure forms were submitting the data properly.

Check it out

Dealbuyer An e-commerce site built with Magento 1. My responsibilities included setting up servers and configuring extension modules. I also was asked to manage this project and determine time estimates for building each capability and organizaing them into development stages.

Check it out
